flawed_nl_solution:
If $44000 is $1000 less than five times more than he had made on his previous painting, then $44000+$1000 = $40500 is five times what he made on his previous painting.
If $40500 is five times what he made for his previous painting, then he made $40500/5 = $<<40500/5=8100>>8100 for selling his previous painting.
#### 8100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45000, not 40500. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
